data.message: I RUN LARGE GROUPS and you have me BLOCKED till NOV 10th. NO ONE ever answers

replies.message: Hey Heather. We understand your frustration, but please sit tight while the block is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2gHvQjG. If you believe you were blocked by mistake, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2yax9Tu. -Elizabeth

If you believed that you were blocked by a mistake please let us know here. 

Seriously face book, I get no response from you!!!
What's the customer service number? So I can get everything done and straight thru your representatives.
I’m going on 3 days of being locked out of my account; messaged directly, posted multiple times on here and submitted multiple reports... still no reply!
